module.name: part_view_definition
module.purpose: The Part View Definition application module supports the requirement to define views of versions of parts.

inscope.li: represent definitions of versions of parts which can collect properties and referential material which define a particular view of a version of a product which is a part or raw material;
all requirements for Product view defintions.

outscope.li: all concepts not involved in the specification of the concepts of views of versions of parts.

uof.name: Part_View_Definition
uof.description: The Part_View_Definition UoF specifies the definitional information for the concept of views of versions of products.
